description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Account of the history and antiquities of St. Leonard's, Edinburgh, its chapel and hospital. (Notes and illustrations.)" Page: 53 Place of Publishing: Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1865 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001271159 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
